docs.text: Home UNISOC IoT Documents unisoc.github.io Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. about.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. about.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: About UNISOC IoT Documentation was created by mkdocs. If you want to generate html format document, please follow below steps. Install required packages pip install --upgrade pip #upgrade pip to the latest version pip install mkdocs #install the mkdocs package pip install mkdocs-material #install the Material theme package You can also look into the officail website of mkdocs and Merterial for more details. Get the document sources git clone https://github.com/unisoc/documentation.git Build html docs cd documentation mkdocs build The HTML documents will be generated under site directory in a few seconds.
docs.title: About

docs.text: cd documentation mkdocs build The HTML documents will be generated under site directory in a few seconds.
docs.title: Build html docs
